Name: Timer Feature
I want: A timer to show how long did I think on each step
So that: I get tracked on how I performe on each move
IMPL Details: get start time and end time of each move.

Name: Rank Human vs Greedy
I want: A rank for how many steps the player take to win GreedyAgent
So that: I can compare with myself and other players
IMPL Details: count steps take when vs Greedy and save to a local file.

Name: Load Board Feature
I want: Before selecting a game mode I can load different file to choose different board.
So that: I can play the game with different boards.
IMPL Details: Based on the Builder Pattern create a board builder so user can choose which file to load.

Name: Random Board Feature
I want: A random board which is not in the file list
So that: I can play the game with lots of different boards
IMPL Details: Randomly generating a board which follows the rule of the game.

Name: show huaman move score
I want: a feature to show how many score can human move get in computee prespective
So that: the human agent can analysis each move to win the game
IMPL Details: use the same method as greedy agent to compute the score.

Name: show possible move for human agent
I want: to show the possible move in human turn
So that: the human agent can know the possible steps for their turn and make a correct move
IMPL Details: use getPossibleMove to show all possible move.

Name: Cheat mode
I want: reducing the difficulty of the game
So that: players can move more than once in a turn

Name: Chat mode
I want: increase the fun of the game
So that: The computer will respond with a sentence based on the score
IMPL Details: Set a string[] and return a string from string[] based on the current score.

Name: Move Feature Bug
I want: To fix the bug that the program crash and returns java.lang.NullPointerException: Cannot invoke ThreeMusketeers.Piece.getType() because the return value of ThreeMusketeers.Cell.getPiece() is null
So that: I can keep playing the game

Name: GreedyAgent Bug
So that: I can play with smarter AI
